## âš¡ Quick Start

### Solution A: Zero Code (5 minutes)
```bash
npm install -g @object-ui/cli
objectui init my-app
cd my-app
objectui serve app.schema.json
```

### Solution B: React Integration (15 minutes)
```bash
npm install @object-ui/react @object-ui/components @object-ui/fields
```

### Solution C: Complete Scaffold (30 minutes)
```bash
git clone https://github.com/objectstack-ai/objectui.git
cd objectui
pnpm install && pnpm build && pnpm dev
```
